name: jules
title: Google Jules
description: Interact with Google Jules coding agent directly from Raycast.
author: ntfelix

commands.name: start-new-session
commands.title: Start Session
commands.description: Start a new coding session with Google Jules

commands.name: list-sessions
commands.title: Search Sessions
commands.description: Search and manage your Google Jules sessions

preferences.name: julesApiKey
preferences.title: Jules API Key
preferences.description: To get your API key: 1. Login to jules.google.com 2. Go to Settings > API (https://jules.google.com/settings/api) 3. Create a new secret key and paste it here.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
